message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $100.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you consider that?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $95.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $90?
I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession and offer the product to you for $92.50.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $88?

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $87?

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm really close to my budget limit. Can you consider $85?
